attributes.action: Make all journeys under 25 miles on public transport free.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We cannot continue to try and tax motorists off the road. Instead the 'carrot' of totally free public transport for local journeys should be used.

To pay for this, road tax should be ring fenced and used solely to subserdise local journeys at 100%. eg Private companies will tender to run buses and then submit a receipt for all the qualifying journeys. The tax on fuel should also be ringfenced to pay for roads.

We have to acccept that people will drive cars regardless but at least reward those who do get on public transport.
